multiplechoiceresponse.label: Which of the following symbolizes a hypothetical syllogism? (Choose one)

choicegroup.choice: p --> (q v r); p; therefore, q v r
[(p & q) v (r v t)] --> r; r --> (s & t); therefore [(p & q) v (r v t)] --> s & t
[(p & q) v (r v t)] --> r; ~r; therefore ~[(p & q) v (r v t)]
